examples.title: S2
examples.description:
Maximise P = x + 2y + z
Subject to:
x + y + z ≤ 8
x + 3y + z ≤ 16
x + z ≤ 5

examples.title: S3
examples.description:
Maximise P = x + 0.8y
Subject to:
x + y ≤ 1000
2x + y ≤ 1500
3x + 2y ≤ 2400

examples.title: S4
examples.description:
Maximise P = 20x + 40y + 30z
Subject to:
x + y + z ≤ 3
0.(3)x + y + 1.5z ≤ 2.5
20x ≤ 55
+ 40y + 30z ≤ 55

examples.title: M1
examples.description:
Maximise P = 3x-2y + z
Subject to:
x + y + 2z ≤ 10
2x-3y + z ≥ 5
x + y ≥ 8

examples.title: M3
examples.description:
Maximise P = 2x + 3t
Subject to:
x + y + z + t ≤ 150
x + 3y + 4z + 2t ≤ 200
xt ≤ 0
+ y + z ≥ 50
